name: NSpreadSheet
short_description: Nix.SpreadSheet is LGPL'ed library for writing (and maybe later for reading also). It's entirely written C# and can be compiled using Microsoft .Net or Mono. It also includes Nix.CompoundFile library for writing OLE 2 Compount Document file format.
